sentences: The Playtones is a Swedish 1950s rock n roll band formed in 2008 in Kallinge.
It was called Boppin' Steve & The Playtones before 2008.
The Playtones won the dansband competition Dansbandskampen in 2009.
2011 the band appeared in Melodifestivalen, the Swedish preselection for the Eurovision Song Contest.
As Boppin' Steve & The PlaytonesAs The PlaytonesOthersRock'n'Roll Christmas Party
